name: Party Monsters
summary: Welcome to Party Monsters, which will have you laughing, competing, and unleashing your inner monster in the most joyful way imaginable! Party Monsters allowing you to move and shoot as monsters. Explore mind-blowing maps, team up with friends, and create joyful memories in the wildest VR experience!   This game is currently still in the demo version. We're continuously updating the game with new gameplay modes, maps, and features. Join our vibrant community on Discord at https://discord.gg/mHMhrTCtZS
